name: Omega Healthcare Investors, Inc.
description: Omega Healthcare Investors, Inc. is a real estate investment trust (REIT) that specializes in the acquisition and management of skilled nursing facilities and assisted living facilities. Founded in 1992 and headquartered in Hunt Valley, Maryland, Omega Healthcare plays a crucial role in the healthcare sector by providing capital to operators of skilled nursing facilities and other healthcare-related real estate. The company primarily invests in facilities that provide long-term care services to the elderly and those with chronic illnesses. Through its portfolio, Omega Healthcare seeks to generate a reliable stream of income while addressing the increasing demand for senior housing and healthcare services due to the aging population. With a focus on sustainability and responsible investing, Omega Healthcare is committed to ensuring quality care for residents in its facilities, working closely with operators to enhance operational efficiencies and improve care standards. The company has a diverse tenant base, which helps mitigate risks and ensure stable cash flows. Omega Healthcare is recognized for its strong financial performance and commitment to shareholder returns through dividends, making it a preferred choice for income-focused investors.
ceo: M. A. (Marty) G. H. D. Beekman

key_executives.name: M. A. (Marty) G. H. D. Beekman
